item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, October 10, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Boris Johnson’s Unleashed — the hero of his own Homeric tale
2. Jenrick and Badenoch to contest Tory leadership after Cleverly knocked out
3. US weighs Google break-up in landmark antitrust case
4. Starmer refuses to rule out raising employer national insurance rate
5. KPMG US chief calls for urgent reform to halt slide in accounting ranks
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, October 10, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
